--- Iteration 3 ---

error CS0246: FooModel not found

Rename FooClient to BarClient
--- TypeSpec Changes Applied ---
Added @@clientName(FooClient, "BarClient", "java")

Build succeeded.

test_cases.description: Explanation comment requires no action - SUCCESS

input.request: yes, setting false is the default behavior. We use some fields like max_tokens which were not supported by newer reasoning models like gpt-5, so we have to add that extra field to ensure that we don't send those params while making LLM calls for evaluation.
